<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mastermind's Eye](/Feats.aspx?ID=2707) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91)

**Prerequisites**
[Butterfly Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2704)

</column>

---

When you succeed at identifying a creature using [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), that creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against your attacks until the start of your next turn; if you critically succeed, it's flat-footed against your attacks for 1 minute. This feat serves as the rogue's [mastermind](/Rackets.aspx?ID=5) racket for the purpose of meeting prerequisites.
name: Mastermind's Eye
